about_the_game:
Soak up the sun on Beach Day dressed as Rune Factory 4 favorites, Clorica and Vishnal!

Get a helping hand as a rookie Ranger, with a set of items to get you started.

The New Ranger Care Package Item Pack includes:
9 x Orange Juice
9 x Cooking Bread
9 x Tomato Seed
9 x Healing Potion

"Clorica's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Vishnal's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
detailed_description:
Soak up the sun on Beach Day dressed as Rune Factory 4 favorites, Clorica and Vishnal!

Get a helping hand as a rookie Ranger, with a set of items to get you started.

"Clorica's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Vishnal's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
